        public static void testStreamRecord()
                             throws java.io.IOException,
                                    HipoException
        Test the writing speed of compressed, random data to a file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - for problems writing file
        HipoException - for problems writing file

      • testWriterVsWriterMT

        public static void testWriterVsWriterMT()
                                 throws java.io.IOException,
                                        HipoException
        Compare the writing of identical data to both Writer and WriterMT to see if resulting files are identical.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - for problems writing file
        HipoException - for problems writing file

      • testStreamRecordMT

        public static void testStreamRecordMT()
        Write 3 files, all using WriterMT, comparing using 1, 2, or 3 compression threads. It's up to the caller to compare the output files to each other to see if they're identical.

      • streamRecord

        public static void streamRecord()
        Test the RecordOutputStream by writing an array of random data to it, then building the stream, then resetting it, in an infinite loop.

      • writerTest

        public static void writerTest()
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Test writing random, compressed data to file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - problems with file I/O.

      • writerTestWithUserHdr

        public static void writerTestWithUserHdr()
                                  throws java.io.IOException,
                                         HipoException
        Test writing random, compressed data to file along with a user header.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - for problems writing file
        HipoException - for problems writing file
